1111.content: Who do you shrink near?
1111.title: Agents of Shield

11111.content: Is it aware or unaware?
11111.title: Chloe Bennet

choices: Another person was approaching the table
1111111.content:
After hours of fans walking by in the crowded, sweltering interior of the convention center, Chloe finally found a break in the crowd to relax for a few moments. She wiped the sweat from her brow and reached for one of the water bottles they’d provided for her; she drained the bottle in a few seconds and tossed it into the can behind her without looking over her shoulder. Chloe checked her phone and saw that there was still a little time before she’d grab a late lunch break from the table. “Uuuugh, I’m gonna starve before 3 o’clock!” she groaned, rubbing her growling stomach as she placed the phone on the table and looked around. There was a pretty popular panel at this time which had taken most people’s attention…a new trailer for a new Marvel movie. If she wasn’t forced to stay here, Chloe might have gone too. Buuut…if no one was around… Pushing away from the table, Chloe crossed her right foot over her knee and slowly slid off her sandal (https://pics.wikifeet.com/Chloe-Bennet-F...).

You groaned, gasping for air as the pressure at you back disappeared and you could lift your head off of the soft, wet surface you’d been ground against for the last two hours. The air around you was still uncomfortably warm, and tasted stale…though almost anything was better than the salty flavor that stayed on your tongue. “T-This is fucking insane” you wheezed, still trying to make sense of what happened when the thunder clapped overhead.

“SO? HOW DO YOU LIKE YOUR QUALITY TIME? WAS IT WHAT YOU WERE EXPECTING? I KNOW IT’S NOT THE SAME AS WAITING IN MY TRAILER…BUT I CAN PROMISE YOU’LL HAVE A VEEERY UNIQUE STORY WHEN THIS IS DONE,” Chloe’s voice boomed. “YOU’RE ENJOYING YOURSELF, RIGHT? I MEAN…I JUST DON’T KNOW WHAT ON EARTH I WOULD DO IF I FOUND OUT YOU WEREN’T HAVING FUN!” Your cheeks burned bright red as you looked up and saw Chloe chuckling at you…stuck to the sole of her foot like a piece of pre-chewed gum (https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/c...). “AWWWWW…WHAT’S WRONG? LIL BUGGY GONNA CRY?”

Your cheeks burned bright red as you tried your best to keep from giving into her taunting…not that she needed it, but any excuse to hurt you more was more than welcome to your giant captor. A hundred thoughts were flying through your head as your mouth struggled to find the words to reply with. From the bottom of your heart, all you wanted to do was to curse out the smug-looking giantess who had you at her mercy…but you held your tongue.

“HMMMM?” Chloe cooed, leaning a little closer as she teased, “WHAT’S WRONG? YOU LOOK LIKE YOU’VE GOT SOMETHING YOU WANNA SAY, BUG. GO AHEAD…I DARE YOU.” The giantess smirked and licked her lips, giggling as she reached down and pressed the pad of her finger to your back! “I’M TRYING MY BEST HERE TO GIVE YOU WANT YOU WANTED…SOMETHIN’ NOT TO YOUR LIKING LITTLE GUY?” She obviously wasn’t going to let you speak. The moment your mouth opened, her finger’s pad rolled up and began to grind your face into the bottom of her sole as her toes wiggled and the sandal fell off. “IF YOU DON’T SAY ANYTHING, I’M JUST GOING TO ASSUME THAT YOU’RE HAPPY THERE…” Giggling, Chloe shifted and flexed her toes as she dragged you along the bottom of your sole, taking extra care to grind your face into the bottom of the ball of her foot in the process (https://pics.wikifeet.com/Chloe-Bennet-F...). She leaned down and whispered teasingly, “WHY NOT GIVE ME A LIL KISS? I MIGHT GIVE YOU A BREAK IF YOU ASK LIKE A GOOD LITTLE BUGGY-BITCH~”

Whimpering, you could feel your skin burning as you were dragged across the rough surface of the ball of her foot…every bit of dirt and dry skin that might be stuck to the bottom of her foot dug into your skin, scraping and scratching at you in the process… You were basically a pumice stone to your giggling goddess. And now, she wanted you to debase yourself by kissing the very skin that was ripping into you…. Still, you slowly opened your mouth and pressed it to the bottom of Chloe’s foot…the giantess gasped….
1111111.title: Quality-Time at the Con~

choices: Getting dragged through piss was enough; Chloe gives you a break at her feet
No topping this...so, Chloe decides to dispose of her toy
11111111.content:
“NO FUCKING WAY…” she said in a breathless whisper, “YOU DID IT?” The air around you began to rumble with her laughter until she quickly covered her mouth and looked around to see if anyone had noticed her. Seeing the coast was clear, Chloe peeled you off the bottom of her foot and dropped you into the palm of her free hand before looking down at you, amused. “OK…SO I GUESS YOU ARE MY LITTLE BITCH NOW, RIGHT?” she asked, addressing you with waning interest (http://www.listal.com/viewimage/9501845h...). “SHIT, I THOUGHT YOU’D PUT UP A LITTLE MORE OF A FIGHT~ BOOOOOOORING~” She began to lift you to the tabletop and tilted her hand so you rolled off onto the hard surface while she continued to chide, “OK BUG…SINCE YOU GAVE UP ON THAT GAME TOO EARLY, HOW ABOUT YOU TELL ME WHY I SHOULDN’T CRUSH YOU RIGHT NOW?”

Struggling to your feet, you looked up at her, slack-jawed. What had she just said?! “D-Didn’t I just do what you told me?!” you screamed up at her, your heart hammering in your ears. “Y-You can’t do this to me! I-I did what you said, you can’t just crush me, dammit!”

A small smirk curled across Chloe’s lips as she slowly raised one hand, “OH? WHAT DO YOU MEAN I CAN’T CRUSH YOU?”

THWACK!

You pissed yourself as you looked around and now saw walls of slight tan flesh surrounding you….

“SEE?” Chloe’s voice thundered. Slowly, you looked up to see her smiling down at you excitedly. “YOU’RE BETWEEN MY MIDDLE AND INDEX FINGER BY THE WAY, LIL BUGGY~ IN CASE YOU DIDN’T KNOW…” The giantess slowly began to lift her hand and a chill ran down your spine as the sound of her skin peeling off the polished surface of the table rang in your ears. She slowly spread her fingers overhead and balled them into a fist…then repeated. Her hand alone seemed to be the size of a small hill when she held it in a fist; when she spread her fingers, it took up about as much room as a baseball diamond, if not more…. “I THINK THE WORDS YOU’RE LOOKING FOR ARE, ‘I’M SORRY FOR BEING A BAD LITTLE BUGGY’” she cooed, delighting as she saw the small puddle forming at your feet (http://gifimage.net/chloe-bennet-gif-ima...). “OH…MY…GOD! DID YOU SERIOUSLY PISS YOURSELF FROM THAT?! ARE YOU A FUCKING LITTLE KID? AWWWWWW~ IS MY WIDDLE BUGGY A SCAWDY-CAT~”

Your cheeks were a pure crimson as the giantess continued giggling at you from high above. Scuttling backwards, you attempted to make some distance when Chloe clicked her tongue.

“NO, NO, NO~” Chloe said as she quickly reached out and pinched you by your right leg. “YOU DON’T GET TO LEAVE A MESS ON MY TABLE,” she said, dragging you back toward the warm puddle. With a flick of her wrist, Chloe flopped you onto your front before pinning you to the table-top with the pad of her finger which held down your entire body…. Slowly, you began getting dragged back toward your puddle of shame. High above, Chloe heard a tiny, terrified squeak as she pushed her bug back into the small drop of piss and began using your body as a rag….
11111111.title: Chloe's Bug Gets Pissed

choices: Chloe crushes you like the bug you are
Chloe stops just short of breaking you...she has a new plan for you...
You try to run past her
111111112.content:
Crying out as your face was sloshed through the small puddle, all you could do was feel your eyes, nose, and mouth burn from the warm liquid Chloe was using you to mop up. Struggling beneath Chloe’s finger, all you could do was try your best to struggle to get out from the digit.

Chloe cooed from high above, “ARE YOU SURE YOU WANNA KEEP FIGHTING? I COULD SQUISH YOU RIGHT NOW, LITTLE BUG~” she purred. She let her finger up and gave you a small flick so you rolled away a bit before giggling. “WELL…” Chloe cooed, “IF YOU END UP SUCKING AS A PET, YOU MAKE A GOOD RAG~” Straightening up in her seat, the actress checked around again to make sure no one was watching before she leaned forward and giggled. “SO…BEG ME NOT TO CRUSH YOUR ASS… I DON’T NORMALLY NEED TO CLEAN UP BUG PISS, SO TRY TO COME UP WITH SOMETHING BETTER THAN A RAG~”

“Y-You’re sick!” you screamed at the top of your lungs, shaking from a mix of rage and humiliation. “Fuck you and fuck this sick game!”

“OH?” Chloe asked, raising an eyebrow. “YOU MEAN, YOU WANT TO QUIT?”

“Yes! Change me back, now!”

Chloe bit her bottom lip and shook her head, giggling, “NOPE…NOT HOW THIS ENDS BUG. IF YOU QUIT, THEN YOU’RE NOT MY BUGGY-BITCH, JUST A BUGGY~” She slowly began to lift a single finger, letting it hover like a lightning-rod (https://www.pinterest.co.uk/pin/38843553...). “AND ALL BUGGIES GET SQUISHED HERE…” Slowly, the finger began to descend toward you!

“N-No! Nononono!” you screamed as you turned tail and began running away from Chloe like your life depended on it! “S-Stop it! I’m a person dammit! You can’t do this to me!” your voice cracked with the last shout as the shadow of Chloe’s finger seemed to engulf you! With one last burst of strength, you threw yourself forward with all your might…

THUMP!

Chloe giggled as she looked down at you on the table, teasing, “OOOOH~ NICE DODGE~” Her finger was just a millimeter away from crushing your legs. “ROUND TWO~” She said, slowly lifting her finger again…but only a little bit before it began to descend again!

TINK!

Her nail met table-top this time, just above your head…

The giantess smirked, purring, “DON’T LOSE YOUR HEAD, BUGGY~” Unfortunately for you and Chloe, before she could start round 3, the noise in the venue began to rise…apparently the show everyone had been at had started to let out. “SHIT…LOOKS LIKE WE GOTTA END THIS FASTER…AND SINCE YOU DON’T WANT TO COME HOME WITH ME…” Chloe flicked her finger back in her direction, launching your body! She smirked as something light and tiny smacked into her sternum before it plummeted under the table. Flexing her toes, Chloe pushed back from the table and looked down at the tiny form between her feet on the floor (https://pics.wikifeet.com/Chloe-Bennet-F...). “AWWWW! NOW YOU REALLY LOOK LIKE A BUGGY ~” Chloe cooed as she began to slide her right foot back into her sandal and slowly raised it up….
111111112.title: Elimination Round

1111111121.content:
After brutalizing you beneath her sole, Chloe slowly began to drag her foot backwards, slowly tracing it across the ground in a lazy approach to her sandal (https://pics.wikifeet.com/Chloe-Bennet-F...). It was your chance to run, but thanks to all the “playing” Chloe had done with you, all you could manage was a pitiful, slow, and…frankly, bug-like, crawl across the floor. Any chance you had at escape was slipping away with each passing second as the giantess’s bare toes blindly dragged across the ground in search for the sandal. Crawling toward the far, front leg of Chloe’s chair, you just prayed that you could make it there before the giant woman turned her attention back to you.

THUMP…

Something shook behind you and your heart began to sink as you realized that Chloe’s toes must have found their way back to her Birkenstocks (https://pics.wikifeet.com/Chloe-Bennet-F...). A rush of adrenaline filled you veins as a giggle from overhead and the fading light from Chloe’s lifting foot told you that the giantess’ attention was once again on you…

Although you couldn’t see her from your position under her foot, you could practically feel the grin on Chloe’s face as she cooed overhead, “Sorry little bug~ You were…almost fun to play with~ Don’t worry though, not everyone can keep it up while playing with me” (https://i.redd.it/7et0h28wjaa21.jpg). The light began to fade as Chloe peeked down and made sure her foot was aimed properly this time to reduce you to paste like she wanted….

Looking up at the black ceiling of rubber hanging overhead, the desperate hope you’d been holding out for was dashed. Humiliating as it would have been, some small part of you had been hoping that your tiny size might offer some chance at survival if you could get wedged into the treads of Chloe’s sandal. You’d swallowed your pride and pinned more hope on that plan than you cared to admit…but looking at the sole of her sandal, the crushing weight of reality crushed that escape plan the same way Chloe was planning to crush you. If this had happened to you even a few months before, there might have been some hope of surviving what the giantess had planned for you. Unfortunately for you, it looked like Chloe REALLY liked this pair of Birkenstocks; the sole had been worn down with use to the point that there was barely a remainder of the treads left on her sandal. Slowly, the sandal began to descend as every cell in your body screamed at you to do anything to survive with no options in sight….

“C-Chloe! Chloe, please don’t do this! I-I’ll be a pet! I’ll do anything you want, just please don’t kill me!” you screamed at the top of your lungs as Chloe’s sole took up more and more of your sky! For a moment, you thought the cries hadn’t reached her ears…but the rubber cloud stopped just a few inches short of slamming into your back. To your delight, the sandal slowly moved to the side as Chloe looked down with amusement…at least your offer had been heard (http://i.imgur.com/PJmvgS6.jpg).

“MY PET?” her voice rang out, punctuated by a poorly-suppressed giggle. You nodded vigorously, praying she took the bait as she seemed to mull the idea over for a moment or two. Nibbling on her bottom lip, the smile on Chloe’s face just grew bigger…maybe she was seriously going to conside- “NAH~ YOU’RE JUST A SILLY LITTLE BUG BITCH; BYE-BYE~” she said, winking and sticking out her tongue as the rubber ceiling came down on your back…hard…( https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CpHdfHbWYAA_...).

THOOOOOOOOM!....

Pressing down on the little thing she’d been tormenting all day, Chloe pressed just hard enough to keep the tiny thing pinned, but not hard enough to crush it…not yet anyway. For a moment, she mulled over your offer while you screamed, cried, and soiled yourself under her Birkenstocks; a tiny pet might not have been the worst idea…and she definitely would have had you whipped well enough. Just as she was about to lift her foot off of the little thing though, she felt something through the thin layer of rubber that remained of her sandal…a tiny crunch. Her cheeks flushed red as Chloe realized she might have applied a little too much force onto your tiny body. Sighing, she shrugged, “Oh well…can’t keep it now…”

You’d have screamed out in pain when Chloe’s foot pressed down and crushed your legs, but the pressure on your back had forced all the air from your lungs! Half-suffocated, half-crushed, you prayed that Chloe would lift her foot off at any moment and declare it was all just a joke! You wouldn’t press charges or anything…fuck, you might lick her toes for the rest of your life as long as she just spar-

Giving her foot a sharp twist to the right while pressing down, Chloe felt a small tickle run up her leg as the bug she’d been playing with popped like a tiny grape! Smirking, Chloe began to grind her foot back and forth like she was putting out a cigarette (https://i.pinimg.com/originals/17/85/49/...).... Pressing the ball of her foot down with all her might, Chloe gave one last little twist before dragging her foot back to examine her work. As small as your body was, the giant actress couldn’t help but giggle when she saw a tiny red splotch on the floor…but that wasn’t enough for the full body, was it? Pulling the sandal off, Chloe examined the sole and found the rest of her bug; she really had thought there weren’t any treads left on this thing, but a nice collection of red mush appeared to be stuck to the sole of her sandal. Scraping it off with a fingernail, Chloe rolled her eyes and flicked you away wordlessly…. Later that night, the janitors would mop up your gooey remains, mixed with dirt, dust, and whatever other crap had been stuck to the sole of Chloe’s Birkenstocks….
1111111121.title: Crushed by Chloe Bennet

choices: Watches you struggle for her amusement
1111111122.content:
When her sole comes down you grit your teeth, hoping to not let this woman hear your screams as she releases you from this torture, until she stops, the pain was intense but clearly wasn't going to be fatal any time soon, unfortunately

"You know what" Chloe says, casually " Just thought of a great idea for what to do with my little bug man, we're going for a walk" you pale as she reaches down and grabs you, then bringing you over to her still unfilled sandal "Now the toe of these are a little stuffy and could get crowded don't you think, so you'll be staying at me heel, okay? Plus " she drops you as there was no way for her to see your expression, her foot following not much later. While you do have to agree this was probably preferable than being crushed between her toes having nothing to breathe but sweat soiled air her heel slammed into you like a press, each step pressing you deeper into the insole as well as her foot, luckily she kept very good care of her feet or else you were sure the hardened skin would have broken something rather than squeeze the air from your lungs like a toothpaste tube. Plus her backless shoes gave you a target to aim for, you may be the size of a bug but anything would be preferable to being tortured by this woman for any longer.

After telling the staff she was going on break she made her way out of the centre and towards the nearest Starbucks a couple streets over, caffeine always made her brain work better and it was sure to help her come up with some fun uses for her pet bugman. The good mood she had fostered dulled slightly when she noticed something was off, that you'd moved since she first put you in her shoe, he was between the arch and her heel but now he was much closer to the back of her shoe. She frowned as she figures out the plan, rising her heel before slamming it down on him "You really think you can escape me?" she hisses, knowing you can hear her despite the volume [https://www.celebzz.com/wp-content/uploa...] "Would you like to spend the rest of you pitiful existence as a speck between my toes?, because I will do that if you try that again" she lowers her heel and smiles when she feels you actually shiver under her foot. Kicking the toe of her shoe against the floor she manoeuvres you to the centre of her heel, perfect for ensuring you stay put, then continued her journey, less happy and enthusiastic than she had been before

You gulp as Chloe plods along the pavement, clearly her steps were more forceful than the last time, you're quite sure she's broken at least a rib since she moved you again. You also knew her threat (even if it was a bluff) was a good deterrent: you don't want to be anywhere near her toes, especially not in the cramped conditions of the tip of her shoe, you also don't want to get any smaller as you already feel practically worthless with the exception of the amusement and possible pleasure Chloe is clearly getting out of tormenting you, so to be inflicted both, probably until you get buried in toe jam, drown in sweat or are crushed between clenching/twitching toes, was something you'd have nightmares about if this hadn't only been a couple hours (has it really been only that long? Shit) since you were shrunk.

Walking into Starbucks Chloe got her coffee, took a seat in the corner and found herself smiling as an idea forms in her head. As subtly as she could Chloe reaches under the table as she lifts her heel, grabbing you before you were even aware of her intentions "Hey bug, I noticed you were getting a little sluggish and tired back at the convention, so I decided to be a benevolent goddess to you and let you share my drink to help perk you up" Chloe whispers with a small smile {https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/image...}, just before dropping you into her drink, luckily she asked for a cold coffee, needing the buzz more than the warmth.

What now?

1) She lets you squirm in her drink for her amusement, wondering when she should fish you out if at all
2) A fan recognises her and wants to chat and get her autograph, when the girl leaves Chloe takes a drink of her coffee, forgetting you were even there until after she swallowed.
1111111122.title: Out for a walk

1111112.content:
Groaning you open your eyes blearily, your brain not quite keeping up so you're left confused in the dark with no idea where you are or how you got here. You lash out in anger but all you do is find a solid cylinder of some sort right behind you in this place. Then all hell breaks loose as your current location is thrown around like it's in an earthquake, shortly followed by the sky opening out and filling the area in blinding light.

'Aw, just so adorable' you hear loudly, when you can see once more your jaw drops: Staring down at you is a massive, grinning Chloe Bennet, and now there is a source of light you see that you are in her purse/handbag/whatever, as well as that the thing you hit was a tube of lipstick 'Hello there, you look so confused, the least responsive contest winner we got, but at least the cutest' she smirks and your brain restarts enough to remember

You entered a contest, you were one of the few who won it actually, and got to meet the cast, specifically Chloe Bennet herself in your case. When you arrived you are introduced to everyone and Chloe brings you into a private room, and in a flash everything blanks out until you came to in her purse.

'Back with me eh little guy? As you can see there was some fine print to this competition, though we didn't mention it at the time, mostly because it meant I didn't need to go through with it if you were ugly or an asshole' she chuckles 'But you're cute and very nice, so I'm keeping you' she says, picking you up and bringing you to her face

'K-k-k-keeping me?' you ask, part worried, and part enthused

'Yep, that's the real prize, you get to be my toy. Personally I think I'm the best choice, I heard Dove put her little one straight up her ass before they even regained consciousness, poor girl's going to think she died and went to hell' Chloe laughs 'Ming got 2, which is lucky as she decided to keep them in her shoes, don't worry I bet you'll get to play with my feet later, but we still have the Con to do then we can properly have fun this evening'

You gulp, but agree that Chloe is the best choice between the female cast. Still this could go very badly, though you hope it didn't as you could see a lot of fun in the future if all went well.

'Well, time to go, but don't worry, I know just where to keep you, and I know you'll love it, just like I will' she grins widely and you pray she was right,

Where does she put you while she's on the panel?
1111112.title: In her purse

1111122.content:
You came to the Con for one real purpose: to see Chloe Bennet. Well that was the initial one, you were working up the courage to go through with your other objective. Standing in front of the bus the AoS cast used to get from the Con to their hotel, you managed to get the door open and slip inside. If you wanted to you could take anything that was here and leave, a personal memento of your time here, but you didn't plan to take anything, you intended to leave something: yourself.

Pulling out the shrinking pill you ordered you think about this one more time before putting it in your mouth and swallowing. You were glad clothes shrunk with you or else things would be very suspicious, but right now you didn't care, what mattered was making sure you could be close to Chloe. Moving around the bus, moving around all the other actor's things until you find where Chloe keeps her things: the most noticeable ways being the Daisy gauntlets, as well as a framed photo of Chloe and Elisabeth goofing off. Here you were, exactly where you wanted to be

What now?

1) You find her bag, and decide to sneak into it, in the hope she'll take you home with her, or at least get you to her hotel room
2) You see a pair of Chloe's flats sitting beside the seat and feel drawn to them, slipping into it just as you hear rumbling as people are coming back to the bus.
1111122.title: A fan outside her bus

11113.title: May, Mulan.... um some other badass?

11113222222.content: How about the Kree woman Sinara?
11113222222.title: Florence Faivre

111132222221.content: Which is best to start?
111132222221.title: Aware or unaware?

choices: Chloe continued dragging her foot toward you, ignoring your pleas...
The massive shoe stopped as the giantess seemed to be listening...
11113222222122.content:
Stealing another look under the table, Chloe did her best to figure out where that thing had run off to…she’d taken her eyes off of it for just a second! Biting her bottom lip, she was just about to sit back up when her dark eyes spotted a slight shifting on the floor… “Got ya~” she said, slowly lifting her right boot….

“Chloe? You drop something?” a voice said as Chloe felt a hand on her shoulder. Startled, Chloe’s foot slammed down and she pulled away from the edge of the table to meet the confused stare of the woman in blue who’d been seated next to her for the last hour. Florence’s face, painted in the blue hue of her Sinara, looked back at her as a poster bearing both of their likenesses was plastered on the wall behind her to promote this fan signing event (https://i.ytimg.com/vi/NVGnsnAme8A/maxre...). Her co-star eyed her carefully as she spoke, “You ok? You look kinda…off?” Florence checked around to make sure none of the crew were looking her way before she leaned in, whispering, “Is it about that person from before? I heard there was a REALLY intense fan here…. I’m SO sorry I got to the table late! Make-up ran over and I-”

Chloe smiled and shook her head, “No, it’s fine. That all got taken care of anyway…just thought I saw a bug under the table. Please don’t feel bad Flo? Seriously, I’m fine! You ready for the next round of signing though? I know you said you weren’t feeling great…”

“I’m ok, they’ve been keeping me hydrated,” the blue-skinned woman said, smiling as she motioned to the cup of cool water set behind her on a small table. Just as Florence was about to say something else, one of the crew waved her over from the front door, causing the blue-skinned woman to sigh. “Looks like they need ‘Sinara’ for something…I’ll be right back,” she said as she got up from her seat and started making her way to the front door where the next round of fans would be gathering any minute. Chloe waved as she walked away…and then quickly peeked under the table again….

It was a little dark under the table, but Chloe could see well enough to find the speck if it moved on her again…first things first though. Lifting the heel of her right boot, Chloe checked the tile for a sign of splatter but saw nothing.

Sighing, she whispered under her breath, “Don’t think you’re gonna run away you lil shit… You know I can’t have you getting found by anyone after this…” With the little time she had left till Florence came back, Chloe’s eyes checked the tiles around her boot for some sign of her target when she thought something moved across one tile just a few inches in front of her foot.

You were drenched in a cold sweat as you continued running for your life, still trying to wake yourself up from what wished desperately was a nightmare! If you’d known things were going to turn out like this, you never would have waited outside Chloe’s dressing room to get her autograph before the signing. Your mind was racing about all the things you might be able to do to get out of this situation when the already dark sky began to darken once again. Looking up, you nearly shit yourself as you saw just a colossal black mass heading right for you! For a split-second your body locked up before some primal part of your brain dug your heels into the ground and threw yourself backwards with all your might as the roaring wind that whipped around the falling sky roared in your ears….

BABOOOOOM!

“UH, UH, UH,” a familiar voice boomed, echoing around you like it had come over the main speakers in a baseball stadium. “I TOLD YOU IT WAS STUPID TO RUN, YOU’RE JUST MAKING THIS HARDER THAN IT HAS TO BE,” Chloe cooed from above. As you crawled backwards on your ass, away from the wall of black rubber that had dropped in front of you, Chloe’s slight giggle shook you down to your bones. “I MEAN,” she teased, “I’M OK WITH CONTINUING TAG LIKE THIS, BUT I THINK YOU MIGHT BE JUST A LIIIIITTLE SMALL TO BE PLAYING WITH ME~ IT’LL SUCK IF YOU HAD AN…ACCIDENT,” Chloe said as the black wall in front of you groaned and slowly began to lift off the ground again. You still couldn’t wrap your head around the fact that the heel of Chloe’s boot alone had nearly killed you several timed today…and it looked like the actress was going to give it another go as the treads began to move back in your direction once more (https://78.media.tumblr.com/97fff244af4c...).

As the heel of Chloe’s right boot moved in your direction…suffice to say, you weren’t exactly cool under pressure… “H-Hey! Hey! T-This isn’t funny anymore!” you shouted, crawling backwards on your ass while unable to tear your eyes away from the imposing mass of black rubber that continued its slow advance toward you. Your ears rang and bones shook with the slow, ceaseless grating of rubber against the hard tile floor! Looking back at Chloe, you shouted again, “Come on! T-This isn’t what you wanna do! R-Really! Please?! Just let me go! I-I won’t tell anyone anything!” Chloe just smiled and continued dragging her foot backwards…though the pace started to increase…. The distance separating you from the ball of her foot was closing quickly as the treads now were swallowing up inches of tile that you’d been on just 30 seconds ago!
11113222222122.title: Meet and Greet at Chloe's Feet...

choices: Chloe knocks you toward Sinara's seat....
Chloe calls Sinara over to introduce you two...
111132222221222.content:
GRRRRRRRRRNNNNN….

“P-Please!?! Chloe, I’m sorry! I’m so sorry! Please don’t do this to me! I-I don’t wann-”

“YOU DON’T WANT TO WHAT?” Chloe said, a sneering smile across her face as her foot paused its advance for a moment and her eyes locked on your quivering form in the shadow of her heel. “I THOUGHT THIS IS WHAT YOU WANTED RIGHT? SOME VIP ACCESS? WELL YOU’RE GETTING IT! I CAN PROMISE YOU’RE GONNA BE THE VERY FIRST PERSON TO FIND OUT WHAT IT’S LIKE GETTING CRUSHED UNDER THIS BOOT….”

You felt sick as the heel began to descend slowly…she was savoring this! “This isn’t what I wanted at all! P-Please, you’re right! You were right, I shouldn’t have tried to get into your dressing room! I’m sorry, ok?!”

“AWWWWWW~ YOU’RE SORRY, HUH?” Chloe said, her heel halting for a moment as you thought you might have found the magic words. “YOU REALLY MEAN THAT YOU’RE SORRY?”

“Yes! I swear!” you shouted up, grasping hold of the first bit of hope you’d found since this insane ordeal started.

Chloe smirked, “OK…IF YOU MEAN IT, THEN I WANT YOU TO KISS MY BOOT.”

“W-What?” you asked, dumbfounded.

“YOU HEARD ME…” Chloe teased, “IF YOU WANT ME TO FORGIVE YOU, THEN KISS THE BOTTOM OF MY BOOT…OR…WERE YOU JUST TRYING TO TRICK ME?”

“Nononononono! I-I’ll do it!” you screamed, pushing yourself to your feet and forcing yourself to walk toward the wall of black rubber that had been chasing you down. The closer you got, the harder you found it to take another step…your head was screaming at you that this was insane! This was like going into the lion’s den and sack-tapping the lion! But, it was hard to say no to Chloe in this situation…. As you finally reached the black wall, you hesitated for a moment before you closed your eyes…stuck your lips out…and pressed them to the rough, dry, dirty wall. You looked back after the first small peck and saw Chloe still smirking at you; you faced the wall and started kissing it a second time…then a third…a fourth, fifth, sixth, seventh and so on until you were full-on making out with the bottom of Chloe’s boot like it was your long-lost lover!

Chloe just laughed as she said, “HOW’S THAT TASTE? YOU LOOK LIKE YOU’RE ENJOYING YOURSELF…LITTLE PERV~”

Turning around, your cheeks bright red, you asked nervously, “L-Look…I did what you said…p-please change me bad?”

“WHAT? WHEN DID I SAY I WAS GOING TO CHANGE YOU BACK?” Chloe said, a wicked smile growing over her lips. “I SAID I’D FORGIVE YOU…I’M STILL GOING TO SQUISH YOUR ASS! BUT THANKS FOR CLEANING MY SHOE A LITTLE…MAKES UP FOR ME HAVING TO WIPE WHAT’S LEFT OF YOU OFF IT IN A COUPLE SECONDS,” Chloe cooed, laughing as she lowered her heel, knocking you to the ground! She was slowly shifting her weight backwards when there was a commotion at the front of the room. Looking up, Chloe saw ‘Sinara’ coming back in with the cheer of fans closely following; her gaze shifted from the front of the room back to under the table...and back to the little bug that was definitely shitting itself under her heel (https://media.giphy.com/media/S8OzULfZ4n...). Giggling, Chloe stopped just short of crushing you as she shifted her heel to the side and said, “ACTUALLY…I THINK YOU SAID YOU LOVES SINARA TOO, RIGHT? I GUESS I CAN BE NICE AND LET YOU HAVE THE VIP EXPERIENCE WITH HER FIRST…”
111132222221222.title: Degraded and Dehumanized

choices: "I think it's some little model? Take a look"
1111322222212221.content:
You didn’t like the sound of that…turning, you began running out from under the heel of Chloe’s boot, praying she’d lose track of you on the dark tiles and in shadows once more. No such luck. After taking maybe four steps, you were knocked to the ground by an unseen blow to the back.

Chloe clicked her tongue disapprovingly from above as she taunted, “NOW, DON’T BE RUDE…IF YOU TURN THIS DOWN WHAT’S SHE GONNA THINK? YOU DON’T WANNA HURT HER FEELINGS, RIGHT LITTLE BUG?” For the first time since you’d shrunken down, Chloe wasn’t leaning down to mess with your little body…she had one of her slender fingers extended as she shot out another shockwave and sent your body tumbling and rolling along the filthy tile floor. A devious smile spread across Chloe’s lips as she focused her finger on your small body and sent another small shockwave toward you! As you went rolling along the tile, Chloe taunted from above, “WHAT’S WRONG? YOU WERE SOOOO HAPPY EARLIER WHEN YOU FOUND OUT I CAN DO THIS…. YOU KNOW, IF YOU’D JUST KEPT YOUR MOUTH SHUT LIKE I TOLD YOU TO, THEN I WOULDN’T HAVE HAD TO SHRINK YOU.” Just when you were about to respond, the ground beneath you began to shake…and not because of Chloe’s powers….

THUNK! THUNK! THUNK! THUNK!

Your heart jumped into your throat as the sound of “Sinara’s” heels clicking against the tile floor became all you could hear. If you could get her attention, then maybe you c-

“HAVE FUN LIL BUG,” Chloe cooed. With a flick of her finger, the young woman who’d plunged your life into this hell sent a new shockwave your way that sent you flying across the ground toward Sinara’s chair! You smashed against the ground, bouncing across it like a ground-ball as the blue-skinned giantess stood next to the table and stretched for a moment while she spoke to Chloe (https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/marv...). As you struggled to your feet, you thought for a split-second that if you just got a little closer to her, Sinara might see you when she got into her seat! You managed to take about three steps before the blue giantess’ chair was pulled out…and a second later, the bottom of her high-heeled shoe was coming down on your head!

BABOOOOM!

It was pure luck that saved you this time…the tapered toe of her shoe had landed just a few centimeters to your side; if she’d been wearing shoes like Chloe, you’d already be paste. You began cursing at yourself as you crawled away, “That was a stupid idea! A really fucking stupid idea!” The very tip of Sinara’s shoe lifted slightly for a second and shifted to the side, catching you with a slight hit that sent you to the floor like you’d just been side-swiped by a car.

Laying on your back, clutching your side, you looked up at the blue giantess and suddenly went very still. She was looking down…at you…or at least it looked that way. Her gold eyes seemed to be locked on you anyway (https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4g1jnSxbDo4/maxre...). Summoning what strength you had left, you leaned up and raised an arm to wave… there was a small bit of motion out of the corner of your eye. Turning your head slightly to the right, you watched Chloe’s finger twitch….

THWACK!

Your body was shivering under the force of Chloe’s seismic powers as she pressed your body against the black leather wall that was Sinara’s foot! You tried desperately to push yourself free, but it did no good; Chloe had you pinned tight to the side of the heel and it looked like nothing was going to get you peeled off of Sinara till Chloe decided to let it happen. Opening your mouth to call out to the blue-skinned giantess, you realized too slowly that it just made your tongue available to drag against the leather wall as you found yourself licking your second shoe of the day… Chloe was having fun though. You could hear her giggle right before the force on your body changed directions and began to drag you roughly toward the heel of Sinara’s foot! Your hands clawed at the black leather for some hand-hold while your tongue continued its involuntary taste-test of the giant heel.

“HEY…UH…SINARA?” Chloe’s voice rang out, getting a giggle from Florence.

“YES?”

Chloe paused, “WELL…CAN YOU MOVE YOUR RIGHT HEEL TOWARD ME? I THINK YOU’VE GOT SOMETHING ON YOUR SHOE….”

The giant Sinara laughed, “YOU SERIOUS?”

“YEAH!” Chloe said, “IT LOOKS LIKE…I DON’T KNOW, SOMETHING PLASTIC? OR A BUG OR SOMETHING? JUST…HERE,” she said as light again shined under the table. Your eyes went wide as the giantess’ hand approached, her massive fingers honing in on you while her other hand kept you pinned right against the arch of Sinara’s foot (https://source.superherostuff.com/wp-con...). The nails of Chloe’s fingers slipped under you as the pads pressed down…and the seismic force vanished.
As Chloe pulled back, Sinara asked, “SO? FIND ANYTHING?”
Chloe just rolled her eyes as she said….
1111322222212221.title: Quakes...

1111322222212222.content:
'HEY SINARA CAN YOU GET OVER HERE A MOMENT!' Chloe calls over, the blue coloured woman raised an eyebrow before walking over, while she did Chloe reaches down and grabs you, squeezing you in her fist just as the other actress reached the table

'WHAT NOW CHLOE?'

'GOT A LITTLE SURPRISE FOR YOU' she grins and opens her hand, you blinking blindly now you were out of the shadows of the table

'Oh Chloe, not again, remember what happened last time?'

Surprisingly the inhuman actress laughs 'Yeah, there was so much pouting and glaring for a week after'

'I heard, Liz I expected, but Ming... you need to stop shrinking people. Need to stop eating your victims too, there's a reason you're not allowed near non essential staff when hungry'

'But it was the only way to make him go away, and he seemed like such a big fan of ours he'd like to see us up close and personal' the eye roll from the other woman felt unnecessary

'No it isn't, plus you'll get bored in a few days and lose track of it then it'll go smush under your boots. You promised the last one to Liz as a pet remember?'

Chloe rolls her eyes 'I remember, and this time I did a little extra; let's just say it's less a shrinking and more a compression'

'Oh you didn't, you used your powers and now he's...'

'Yep, impact resistant to anything lighter than a car' both laugh while you silently steamed; she bluffed her way into getting you to kiss her boots and she couldn't harm you.

'So what was the point of calling me over Chloe, the talks start in like 5 minutes?'

'Simple, he likes you just as much as me, so it didn't seem fair I got to have all the fun with the little bug. So for the next couple hours he's yours to do with as you please' Chloe smiles but Sinara frowns

'And how exactly can I play with him when we have to do this right now?'

'Well he can't die but he can be crushed, so anyway that can crush him while also stopping him from escaping will be perfect. Such as being trapped between those perky butt cheeks of yours perhaps, make a bit of extra padding for these shitty seats' she suggests with a smirk and you start panicking again

'True, or maybe in my shoe perhaps?' Sinara suggests, removing the boot and revealing the makeup people went all out as she exposed a pale blue foot dripping with sweat, which caused Chloe to laugh and you to turn ghostly pale.

So which option will Sinara be going with?

1113122.title: Dafne Keen

choices: Struggling, you manage to get out from under Dafne's lace and latch on...
Before you could escape, Dafne begins to move again...
111312212.content:
The shadow was continuing to gain on you even though adrenaline was coursing through your body to give you an extra burst of speed. Each breath you sucked in felt like it was filled with razor-blades. Each step you took threatened to make your legs give out as your muscles screamed in pain. Each agonizing second dragged on as the most primal parts of your brain tried to get your body out of the way o-

BABOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!

You couldn’t tell which way was up or down as you flipped and flew through the air. Crashing into the ground, your body limply skid and rolled across the ground before coming to rest in an exhausted heap. Panting, you felt tears beginning to well in your eyes from sheer relief. You were convinced that there was no good reason you should alive right now, and yet here you were in one piece. Slowly, you forced yourself to look at the source of the shadow and explosion… a white wall. The adrenaline running through your body was making it impossible to calm down as your gaze slowly drifted up: the white wall gave way to an expanse of black fabric…the black fabric was decorated with white accents…it then gave way to a brief glimpse of tan that quickly got covered by blue denim. Your head felt like it was on fire as you struggled to accept that you were looking at a sneaker. A colossal sneaker that had almost crushed you like a bug. And whose sneaker was it? Your gaze slowly moved higher until you saw what you’d been afraid of; towering over you like something from mythology, Dafne Keen happily continued reaching into the kitchen cabinet of the tour bus she’d been assigned to for the latest round of promotional interviews (https://scontent-atl3-1.cdninstagram.com...). You didn’t have the luxury of waiting to see what Dafne was searching for. If you continued staying down on the floor like this, then next time her sneaker hovered over you, there was no guarantee you’d be able to escape a bug’s fate.

“Think, think, think,” you muttered, trying to think of how to get off the ground; making the plan was easy, actually figuring out how to escape from Dafne’s titanic feet was something else entirely. The white wall of rubber seemed to stretch out in front of you for a hundred feet in each direction as you placed yourself at the instep of her right foot. Just trying to compare yourself to the 4’11” titaness who continued rummaging for something in the cabinet overhead, you figured you couldn’t be much more than 1/8 of an inch tall…if you were generous.

As if to rub it in, Dafne grunted overhead and slowly began to lift onto her tip-toes, her size 4 Vans lifting to look more like skyscrapers than sneakers. The idea of her being too short to reach something just felt humiliating as you found yourself staring at patterns on her sole that could have easily fit dozens of you within their boundaries. “You’ve got to be kidding me,” you whimpered, trying not to run despite every cell in your body begging you to get away. You wanted to run, but something had caught your attention when Dafne raised herself up: her shoelaces. If you could hold your ground, you thought there might be a chance you cou-

THOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!

Dafne growled and dropped back down, the slight curve of her right sneaker just barely sparing you from a grisly end as gunk stuck to her sole. Not only did her landing knock you flat on your ass, but it also did what you were hoping for. Looking up, you felt your spirits lift for a moment as Dafne’s lace began falling…toward you? Joy was replaced with terror as you struggled to avoid the shoelace to no avail. The woven walkway slammed down, knocking you flat on the ground under the grimy lace and pinning you like the tiny mite you were compared to Dafne (https://www.pinterest.com/pin/5545761416...). One step forward, two steps back.

111332111.title: Aware but where?

choices: The wad of gum slammed into your body...
The wad of gum missed...but Christian was reaching down for you...
It missed and Kish lifts her foot over you
1113321111.content:
Your ass hit the alien ground of the parking lot a second after that strange flash of light from Christian’s cellphone. Thinking was impossible with the thick fog that clouded your senses and made your ability to perceive the world around you almost non-existent. What had she hit you with? Had she tazed you!? “F-Fucking cunt!” you hissed, too dizzy to stand up and only able to blindly grope at the ground. Whatever she’d hit you with, it seriously messed with your head; parking lot asphalt wasn’t comfortable by any means, but you knew the lot didn’t have this many jagged bumps and edges along the floor. If it did then no car would ever have made it out of there without losing every tire! Slowly the fog began to lift and the tunnel vision you’d been stuck with began to expand… and the world around you just grew stranger by the moment…. “W-What the? What is this shit?” you whispered, mind racing. Apparently, your sense of touch hadn’t been far off; the ground really had become a sea of sharp edges and jagged, black ridges! Christian wasn’t in front of you and neither was her ca-

“HEHEHE…DAMN, I DIDN’T KNOW IT WAS GOING TO WORK THAT WELL~”

GRRRRRRRRRRN….

Head snapping up, you couldn’t make sense of the scene playing out in front of your eyes! The alien landscape gave way to a wall of black material that appeared to be raising up like a castle wall with five tan boulders sitting across the parapets; each one was decorated with wavy lines that ran across their fronts and were topped with a thick white-ish material. No. Not totally white anyway; there appeared to be a hot-pink color that ran along the top of the objects. You could feel your head splitting as every neuron fired off trying to make sense of the scene before you…because there was no way those could be what you thought they were….

“WHAT’S WRONG? YOU SHOCKED? I WAS JUST MAKING SURE YOUR OUTSIDE MATCHED YOUR INSIDE,” the voice rang out again, threatening to burst your eardrums. Caught halfway between having a heart-attack and shitting yourself, you had no choice but to recognize that the god-like thunder was a very familiar voice. It belonged to the woman you’d just gotten into an argument with…but the 5’7” woman’s voice definitely hadn’t been that loud before. Craning your neck up, past the strange wall of black, tan, white, and hot pink, you tried to confirm the dreadful thoughts running through your head; your eyes gazed up past seemingly endless pillars of black fabric before finally seeing the soft orbs of flesh…and Christian’s smirking face…seemingly hundreds of feet overhead…. “THERE SOMETHING ON MY FACE, BUGGY?” Christian said, her jaw continuing to work on a piece of gum she’d popped into her mouth when she first got out of her car….

Your lizard-brain kicked in, telling you to make a 180-turn and run for your god-damned life! Taking off across the rugged landscape of asphalt at your new size, you just kept praying that you’d wake up from this nightmare. People didn’t shrink like this…she must have drugged you or something!

Smirking, Christian could only roll her eyes as the ant-sized asshole who’d met her in the parking lot now ran from her…if you could call it running. “Mhm~ Keep running, little one. I’m sure it’ll work out for you~” she said, standing up to her full height…and lifting her right foot. “Look out below,” she teased before stomping down with all the force she could put into her perfectly pedicured, pink toes (https://pics.wikifeet.com/Christian-Serr...)….

BABOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!

“HOOOOOOLY SHIT, THAT WAS A CLOSE ONE~ ALMOST GOT YOU THERE, BUGGY,” Christian laughed overhead as you were laid out by her stomp. The vast landscape in front of you had been replaced by the foam sole of her flip-flop…a mere millimeter away from you. This time you didn’t escape death without pissing yourself. Too scared to move a muscle, you could only look at the foam wall, and listen to the groan of rubber and plastic against the tiniest wiggles of Christian’s toes as the giantess seemed to delight in your despair.

Shivering, you tried to crane your neck up at the sky-scraper-sized woman who was playing with your life. Swallowing what little scrap of pride you’d held onto, you choked, “P-Please! I’m s-s-sorry! I shouldn’t have said anything to you! I-I promise I learned my lesson! Please turn me back! I-I w-wanna be big again!” You waited for the colossal woman to reply…and waited…and waited…and waited…. Nothing. Christian just continued smirking down at you while the groan of her flip-flop constantly reminded you just how vulnerable you were to her whims. “C-Christian?! This…t-this isn’t funny anymore! You made your point! Please turn me back now! P-Please?! I won’t bother you again! I-I promise!” Still nothing. “W-What do you want me to say?! I-I’m begging you! There! Are you happy now?!”

Christian finally replied…with a small giggle that all at once turned your stomach and re-sparked the rage that had gotten you into this mess! The foam wall that had almost flattened you began to groan once again as Christian slowly squatted down. Your mind couldn’t even comprehend something that big coming down so gracefully…the closest thing you could compare it to would be a meteor trying to make a soft landing. Under her shifting weight, Christian’s flip-flop slowly began to drag away as she re-adjusted so you were squarely under her hips and isolated in the middle of the jagged field of asphalt. “SORRY, COULDN’T HEAR YOU ALL THE WAY DOWN HERE~ WERE YOU TRYING TO SAY SOMETHING, BUG?”

You couldn’t help it…after getting shrunken and nearly crushed, Christian’s comment was the straw that broke the camel’s back. Inhaling deeply, your vision went red as you screamed, “F-Fuck you! This isn’t a fucking game you selfish fucking bitch! Turn me back! Now!”

That smirk didn’t leave her face…but Christian was clearly done playing with you as she slowly began to stand up. Without raising her voice, the giantess purred, “YOU MIGHT BE RIGHT…THIS WAS FUN FOR A LITTLE BUT I GUESS YOU’RE DONE PLAYING. I’M NOT TURNING YOU BACK, BUT DON’T WORRY. I WON’T BE SELFISH ANYMORE~ IN FACT, HERE’S A GIFT FOR YOU…YOU LITTLE SHIT.” Your eyes went wide as Christian flipped you off before brushing her hair back…and spitting the wad of gum she’d been chewing on directly at your tiny form (https://66.media.tumblr.com/3017a6a398e9...)…
1113321111.title: Lots Little Loser, Meeting Christian Serratos

choices: Christian's stomach demands she get food first...
11133211112.content:
Christian smirked down at you as her chewing began to slow down to more deliberate, powerful bites. Each motion of her jaw worked a lump of gum bigger than a house compared to you…and Kish seemed intent on letting you know just how weak and pathetic she’d made you. “IT’S A PRETTY BIG GIFT…PROBABLLY MORE THAN YOU DESERVE, SO BE SURE TO THANK ME, BUG” she said, opening her mouth for a second as she reached in and pinched the wad of pink gum. Instead of yanking it out though, she began to twist it around her pointer-finger and slowly dragged it out, chomping down on one end so that a single strand of pink bridged the tip of her finger to the purse of her full lips (https://dandeutschopticaloutlook.com/wp-...). With a quick flick of her wrist, the strand swung from her lips and wrapped around her finger in a tight ball. Pressing her thumb against the base of the bubble-gum, Christian looked down at you and winked.
“CATCH,” she said, flicking the wad of gum at the ground and waiting to see your tiny body swallowed in the elastic ball….

THWACK!

A warm spray of liquid came off the wad of gum that slammed down just in front of you…no doubt some of Kish’s spit that had soaked the messy, pliable, pink piece of gum into this mushy mound. Looking up, you expected to see the same sarcastic, mocking smirk across Serratos’ face; instead, you just saw the giant woman frowning down at you with a look of absolutely disgust. “I. SAID. CATCH.” She growled, slowly grinding her right foot against the ground like she was putting out a cig or crushing a bug…if she was this pissed at you, then you feared the second option was imminent.

You felt your throat go dry and your limbs shake as you struggled to find your voice. With your words struggling out of your mouth, you croaked, “B-But…i-it could h-have k-k-killed me!”

Kish raised an eyebrow and crossed her arms, slowly lifting her right flip-flop-clad foot so its shadow swallowed you and the wad of gum. Pebbles and other bits of dirt rained around you like a horrific hail storm, the stones pelting you and peppering the pink wad of gum until it looked like someone had sprinkled it in spices. “YOU HAVE UNTIL I COUNT TO FIVE TO CRAWL INTO THAT PIECE OF GUM LIKE THE PIECE OF DIRT YOU ARE. IF YOU DON’T…WELL, I’LL MAKE YOU WISH I JUST STOMPED YOUR ASS RIGHT NOW,” the giantess’ voice thundered menacingly. For a moment, you didn’t know if she was serious…then her foot began to lower. “ONE…TWO…THREE…BETTER GET GOING BUG…”

THOOOOM!

You had nearly shit yourself when the massive foam wall of Kish’s flip-flop slammed down just an inch to your right, kicking up a gust of wind and shooting bits of gravel and dirt at you that cut at your skin like a horrendous sandstorm. Small cuts stung all across any exposed skin you had. Slowly, you looked up and saw the smirking face of the giantess grinning down at you.

“WHAT? YOU THINK I WON’T DO IT FOR REAL?” Kish asked. Brushing her dark hair behind her ear, the giantess leaned her weight forward onto the ball of her foot and began grinding it back and forth. You could hear the crunch of the asphalt under her foot and saw the skin nearest the ground begin to grow paler as her weight pressed down and forced the blood from her flesh. “YOU KNOW WHAT WOULD HAPPEN IF I STEPPED JUST A LIIIIIIIITTLE BIT CLOSER TO YOU? THINK YOU’D HAVE SOME FUN DOWN THERE, BUG? WANT ME TO LET YOU EXPERIENCE IT?” she asked, chuckling as she saw you imagining the mangled mess of blood, guts, bone fragments, and sinew you’d have been reduced to with just a small twist of her slim ankle (http://www4.pictures.zimbio.com/bg/Chris...). In fact, you imagine you’d have looked a lot like the piece of gum Christian had nearly spat on you…though a bit more red than pink perhaps.

She didn’t need to say another word, feeling gross in gum was better than being turned into a messy slurry under the bottom of her flip-flops. You sprinted for the pink glob of gum and threw yourself forward, plopping into it like a gooey beanbag chair that was as interested in swallowing you up as Kish’s mouth had been in reducing the single stick of gum into this pink prison. Instantly, you could feel the pink material clinging to your skin, pulling and smothering you while the giantess who’d put you into this situation broke out into laughter overhead. You could feel the blood rushing to your cheeks and a deep shame burrowing through your stomach as you realized just how wrapped around Christian’s finger you were. With just a twist of her foot, she’d made you throw yourself into the equivalent of a stick mouse trap. As your struggles quickly informed you that escaping this bite of gum wasn’t going to happen, you dearly wished you’d tried running away instead…at least if she had stomped on you, this would have been over fast.

“HOLY SHIT…I DIDN’T THINK YOU WERE THAT DESPERATE, BUG~ BUUUUUT…YOU TOOK SO LONG TO LISTEN TO ME…SO I’M GONNA HAVE TO PUNISH YOU AGAIN. BLAME YOURSELF,” Kish said, squatting lower. As you turned your head to look up at the giantess, you saw her stick out her tongue and flip you off before grabbing her cell-phone with an evil giggle that told you your struggles were just beginning (https://66.media.tumblr.com/3017a6a398e9...). “SMILE!” she said, a small flash of light engulfing you yet again as Kish’s laughter just seemed to grow exponentially louder….

THOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM…..

“OH. MY. FUCKING. GOD. HEHE, MIGHT HAVE GONE A LITTLE FAR THERE…ALMOST LOST TRACK OF YOU, BUG,” Kish cooed, her voice now threatening to burst your eardrums as it roared like a plane was just barely buzzing your head. Still stuck in the wad of gum, you weren’t sure just how small Kish had made you until you tried to crane your neck up, thinking you’d be able to see her face. Instead, all you could see was the massive black foam wall of Kish’s flip-flop that had more than doubled in height since Kish nearly crushed you underneath it. You struggled against the warm wad of gum, pulling away to try and meet the giantess’ gaze, but it quickly became clear to you that Kish had become something beyond comprehension…the tips of her toes just barely came into view with their tan walls, carved with thick ravines that you realized made up the print of the giantess’ toe pads. Her nail came out like a massive canopy, several feet thick from your new point-of-view. “LIKE THE VIEW FROM DOWN THERE? DON’T TELL ME YOU’RE REGRETTING IT NOW~ WE STILL HAVE A FULL DAY OF SHOPPING LEFT,” Kish said, slowly reaching down with her pointer-finger that looked larger than a god-damned cruise ship dropping from the sky….

THUNK!

Everything turned dark and shuddered as Christian’s pointer-finger’s nail crashed down somewhere behind you. Struggling against the gun like a fly in fly-paper, you knew your struggled were pointless but still you couldn’t help it. Every cell in your body was telling you to run, but the thick pink glob had you stuck. A moment later, your ears began to ring and your bones shuddered as Kish dragged her finger back in your direction, trying to scrape the shrunken wad of gum off the ground….

Scraping her finger against the ground of the parking lot, Christian felt the gravel getting under her nail and sighed, regretting for a moment just how small she’d made her little bug. Finally, something wet and warm pressed against the pad of her finger and Kish knew she’d caught her prize. Slowly lifting her finger, the giantess looked down at her digit, giggling, “Perfect~ That’s a good look for you…even if I have to squint to see your ass.” There was a single, small pink blob stuck to the pad of her finger with two or three pebbles stuck and embedded in it…though each one looked to be struggling to hang onto since the ‘wad’ of gum was more of a speck of pre-chewed pink at this point. “Don’t worry, I’ve got the perfect place for your little ass,” Kish cooed, moving her finger toward her right foot and scraping it off on the black foam instep of her flip-flop.

GRRRRRRRRN!

You could hear the plastic straps of Christian’s flip-flop thong screaming against the flexing toes while the goddess-sized actress seemed pleased with her actions. The simple act of Kish rising up to her full height and causing the foam base to bend, groan, and scream under the shifting weight of the living mountain you’d somehow managed to offend (http://www1.pictures.zimbio.com/bg/Chris...). “Oh god…p-please be gentle,” you whimpered, knowing the uncaring goddess overhead would neither hear your prayers, nor answer them even if she could. Instead, the air just shuddered with her light giggle, rolling like thunder that made your eyes vibrate in your skull. The heat pouring off of Kish’s arch was already starting to make you sweat as you realized your new size meant Kish’s body had its own independent climate around it. You were hers…and the giantess was going to make sure that your every cell knew it by the time she grew tired of you.
11133211112.title: Bigger Problems

11133211113.content:
“OH MY GOD…SERIOUSLY? CAN’T EVEN HAVE FUN WITH THIS TODAY,” she sighed as she slowly began lifting her foot overhead while the piece of gum she’d tried to bury you under came to a sticky stop just to your right. “THIS WAS A GOOD WAY TO KILL FIVE MINUTES, BUT I’M NOT WASTING MY WHOLE DAY WITH A BUG…SORRY!” Kish said with a little smirk as her toes pointed down and the sandal began to descend out of the sky like something from the Book of Revelations! From Kish’s perspective though, she wasn’t some colossal diety passing judgment on you…she was just taking a step forward without the slightest bit of care for the tiny insect that got between her foot and the ground (https://www.wikifeet.com/Christian_Serra...). You, however, got to see as the entire sky was replaced with the filthy rubber sole of Christian’s sandal blotting out the sky like some kind of biblical nightmare! Turning on the ball of your own foot, you began running for your life, knowing that staying anywhere under the darkness of her foot was a one-way ticket to whatever afterlife you’d lined yourself up for. Arms pumping, lungs burning, skin tingling, and vision darkening, you focused whatever energy you had left and threw yourself at the sharp divide of light and dark that would decide whether you lived or became grime on Christian’s sandal sole….

BABOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!

Christian slowly ground the toe of her sandal back and forth like she was putting out a cigarette. Glancing down, the giantess expected to lift her foot and find some gummy mess of guts and sinew sticking to the bottom of her foot. Instead, she saw your tiny ass in a panting mess less than an inch from the tip of her sandal.

From high above, Kish’s voice thundered, “GUESS YOU STILL WANT TO PLAY, IS THAT RIGHT BUGGY? IT’S CUTE…BUT I DON’T REALLY MAKE FRIENDS WITH PESTS. BUUUUUT…I MEAN, I CAN PLAY WITH YOU A LITTLE MORE. THINK FAST~” Christian smirked as her sandal-clad foot quickly lifted into the air again and aimed to take you out for good with this next stomp! Her foot began to crash down and you could see that she was going for a slight squish; it seemed like she was hoping to crush the right half of your body alone…but that was fine by you. Rolling to your left, you braced yourself as the foam platform of her sandal slammed down and sent you rolling from the massive gust of wind its impact created!

THOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!

“ALRIGHT…

She only shrank you and popped the gum back in her mouth
111332111133.content:
Christian smirked down at you as her chewing began to slow down to more deliberate, powerful bites. Each motion of her jaw worked a lump of gum bigger than a house compared to you…and Kish seemed intent on letting you know just how weak and pathetic she’d made you. “IT’S A PRETTY BIG GIFT…PROBABLLY MORE THAN YOU DESERVE, SO BE SURE TO THANK ME, BUG” she said, opening her mouth for a second as she reached in and pinched the wad of pink gum. Instead of yanking it out though, she began to twist it around her pointer-finger and slowly dragged it out, chomping down on one end so that a single strand of pink bridged the tip of her finger to the purse of her full lips (https://dandeutschopticaloutlook.com/wp-...). With a quick flick of her wrist, the strand swung from her lips and wrapped around her finger in a tight ball. Pressing her thumb against the base of the bubble-gum, Christian looked down at you and winked.
“CATCH,” she said, flicking the wad of gum at the ground and waiting to see your tiny body swallowed in the elastic ball….
THWACK!
A warm spray of liquid came off the wad of gum that slammed down just in front of you…no doubt some of Kish’s spit that had soaked the messy, pliable, pink piece of gum into this mushy mound. Looking up, you expected to see the same sarcastic, mocking smirk across Serratos’ face; instead, you just saw the giant woman frowning down at you with a look of absolutely disgust. “I. SAID. CATCH.” She growled, slowly grinding her right foot against the ground like she was putting out a cig or crushing a bug.

Kish raised an eyebrow and crossed her arms, slowly lifting her right flip-flop-clad foot so its shadow swallowed you and the wad of gum. Pebbles and other bits of dirt rained around you like a horrific hail storm, the stones pelting you and peppering the pink wad of gum until it looked like someone had sprinkled it in spices. “YOU HAVE UNTIL I COUNT TO FIVE TO CRAWL INTO THAT PIECE OF GUM LIKE THE PIECE OF DIRT YOU ARE. IF YOU DON’T…WELL, I’LL MAKE YOU WISH I JUST STOMPED YOUR ASS RIGHT NOW,” the giantess’ voice thundered menacingly. For a moment, you didn’t know if she was serious…then her foot began to lower. “ONE…TWO…THREE…BETTER GET GOING BUG…”
THOOOOM!

You had nearly shit yourself when the massive foam wall of Kish’s flip-flop slammed down just an inch to your right, kicking up a gust of wind and shooting bits of gravel and dirt at you that cut at your skin like a horrendous sandstorm. Small cuts stung all across any exposed skin you had. Slowly, you looked up and saw the smirking face of the giantess grinning down at you.
“WHAT? YOU THINK I WON’T DO IT FOR REAL?” Kish asked. Brushing her dark hair behind her ear, the giantess leaned her weight forward onto the ball of her foot and began grinding it back and forth. You could hear the crunch of the asphalt under her foot and saw the skin nearest the ground begin to grow paler as her weight pressed down and forced the blood from her flesh. “YOU KNOW WHAT WOULD HAPPEN IF I STEPPED JUST A LIIIIIIIITTLE BIT CLOSER TO YOU? THINK YOU’D HAVE SOME FUN DOWN THERE, BUG? WANT ME TO LET YOU EXPERIENCE IT?” she asked, chuckling as she saw you imagining the mangled mess of blood, guts, bone fragments, and sinew you’d have been reduced to with just a small twist of her slim ankle (http://www4.pictures.zimbio.com/bg/Chris...). In fact, you imagine you’d have looked a lot like the piece of gum Christian had nearly spat on you…though a bit more red than pink perhaps.ared the second option was imminent
She didn’t need to say another word, feeling gross in gum was better than being turned into a messy slurry under the bottom of her flip-flops. You sprinted for the pink glob of gum and threw yourself forward, plopping into it like a gooey beanbag chair that was as interested in swallowing you up as Kish’s mouth had been in reducing the single stick of gum into this pink prison. Instantly, you could feel the pink material clinging to your skin, pulling and smothering you while the giantess who’d put you into this situation broke out into laughter overhead. You could feel the blood rushing to your cheeks and a deep shame burrowing through your stomach as you realized just how wrapped around Christian’s finger you were. With just a twist of her foot, she’d made you throw yourself into the equivalent of a stick mouse trap. As your struggles quickly informed you that escaping this bite of gum wasn’t going to happen, you dearly wished you’d tried running away instead…at least if she had stomped on you, this would have been over fast.
“HOLY SHIT…I DIDN’T THINK YOU WERE THAT DESPERATE, BUG~ BUUUUUT…YOU TOOK SO LONG TO LISTEN TO ME…SO I’M GONNA HAVE TO PUNISH YOU AGAIN. BLAME YOURSELF,” Kish said, squatting lower. As you turned your head to look up at the giantess, you saw her stick out her tongue and flip you off before grabbing her cell-phone with an evil giggle that told you your struggles were just beginning (https://66.media.tumblr.com/3017a6a398e9...). “SMILE!” she said, a small flash of light engulfing you yet again as Kish’s laughter just seemed to grow exponentially louder….

1113321122.content:
Working as a freelancer photographer was tough, but doing it the way you did it is even tougher. You see some time ago in your past, you were fired from your paparazzi job and with photography being your only real skill you dived into freelancing. But you found that the money you got from taking photos of celebrities wasn't to good. And since it was such a popular way to make money, the only way to make real money off of it was to get certain photo's at certain angles and/or at close proximity. That led you to meet a man named S, at a bar who over heard your situation one night and offered to help you with a partnership. Being curious you played along and later that night when he brought you to S-lab. He presented you with a huge experimental device that could shrink and grow thing's. So, since he has had none of human test subject's, he explained an idea to you on how to make both of your goal's a reality by shrinking you and taking you to the spot's where certain celebrities were. Which would give you a way to take photo's and then make it back to him for result's on how you feel and stuff. It made for you to say an easy "Why not, what do you have to lose...".

It is the perfect arrangement that has lasted a month now, you and S had a system down to start with shrink down at the lab, drive to the location, S would give you a certain time length that would last up to 10 hour's that would be how long that he would wait for you and if you didn't make it back, you were considered dead. But this wasn't to big of a deal for you, since all the place's you went to were small place's that made it easy for you to get in and out with a good amount of time still left over.

And today is your chance to snag some good photo's of Christian Serratos at a con. Which would be your biggest location to date, but you weren't worried about it at all. So, your routine started as normal and when you arrive at the location, S had decided to bring you to her himself or at least as far as he could bring you. And when he arrived he told you 10 hour's and to meet at a specific location.

You were then left to your own devices and easily made it over to Christian in 20 min's. Making it under a black clothed table that she was sitting at. You saw her feet resting in a pair of black sandal's. Also noticing the specks of dust on the sandal's and the strand's of carpet around you. It's still a lot for you to take in even doing this for the past month. But knowing that you need to get the job done fast. You bust out your camera, begin setting up, and taking photo's of her feet that for your "none brand customer's". Then moving on you know that you need to get some photo's of Christian's face for your brand customer's. So walking out slightly from under the table you look around and above you. Seeing to your right Christian's gigantic tan bag/purse that was wide open. Above you f course see Christian sitting above you in her chair. And then to your left you see a wire that is connected to something at the top of the table and reaches down to the floor. Seeing that you knew that is going to be your ticket up.

So, you climb your way upward, being thankful of the rope climbing you had to do back in your high school years. Then making it to the top of the table you run behind a blue giant water bottle. And looking around you see crowd's of giant's walking around the con, enjoying there time, and pretty much just minding there own business. Turning your attention back toward's Christian booth, you notice about an average sized line for her booth and then there is Christian who was in the middle of a conversation with a female fan who was dressed in a good Sakura cosplay with the pink hair and the whole 9 yards. You notice that this Sakura girl seem's to have just started talking with Christian and you think that this is the perfect distraction for you to take your photo's.

Getting yourself ready, you begin with speed. Taking photo's all around the side of the table that your at of Christian. Knowing that just one side isn't going to be enough. You make your way towards the other side of the table. Hiding behind things like Christian's wallet and stacks of paper. All while taking photo's in till you were in the most vulnerable spot that you could be in. Seeing Christian's full face listening and looking up at the Sakura girl, who when you turn to see her towering over you and not really sure if she is tall or if it's just your perspective. But seeing that doesn't matter you turn back around and also see just how close you really are with Christian's giant arm just laying itself right by you. Any photographer or person would probably kill to be in this position. But you can't focus on stuff like that.

So, you pull out an adjustable/break down-able tripod that you had and placed your camera on it to get some of the best angles. While taking a few photo's, Christian and the Sakura girl have stop there full length discussion. And Christian is starting to fill out a special autograph for the Sakura girl, while she is just standing, towering behind you. Thinking that this could make for a great picture of Christian filling out an autograph. You ready your camera to take a set of photo's in a certain amount of time. And you are at this moment faced with your first problem in a while as...
