1121222.content:
You’d come to the con early and had gotten your booth set up, hoping to catch a glimpse of Vamp early in the day. Instead, nothing happened. No Vamp, no familiar Stormtrooper, nothing. At least, not till the air was thick with the smells of food, plastic, glue, sweat…the unique mix that you got when you crammed several hundred people into the same space. The con was in full swing when your eyes finally fell on a familiar stormtrooper outfit. TK-6683 was looking in your direction and seemed to be talking to someone behind her: she was in her classic stormtrooper armor and you could feel your heart begin to race as she pointed in your direction (http://unrealitymag.com/wp-content/uploa...). She was walking your way! Straightening up, you started looking for another set of white armor, hoping Vamp was with her as a pair like in all of their pictures!
“Holy shit, this looks so cute!” a familiar voice called over the din of the crowd. TK was right in front of you and you knew that the voice speaking to you belonged to Vamp! Your eyes darted to the side, looking for the second stormtrooper when you finally saw her…only…
You couldn’t help but show a little disappointment as you said, “Oh…no Star Wars outfit this con?” TK shot daggers at you with her glare as Vamp smiled awkwardly and bounced on her bare feet; this con, she’d gone with her Apu costume it seemed (https://i.pinimg.com/originals/d2/b7/ba/...).
“I was feeling a change of pace,” she said, trying her best to be polite to you as you quickly grew bright red and began stumbling for words. Before you could fix things though, she looked away and chirped, “I’m gonna go check out that booth for a bit! Nice to meet you!”
You tried to call out, but Vamp was gone in a flash…leaving only TK in front of you. The stormtrooper frowned and hissed, “It broke when we traveled here! Her costume. I told her that Apu would be fine and she was self-conscious about it all day…so thanks for that.” She paused and seemed to size you up for a moment, her icy glare offering you no kindness as you attempted to save some face. Before you could get a full sentence out though, TK checked over her shoulder to see if Vamp was nearby and smirked when she saw her friend was preoccupied…as her gaze shifted back to you, your blood ran cold. “No one fucks with my friend’s day,” TK said as she lifted the blaster and leveled it at your face (https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BvVWGHxCQAAg...). There was a small flash of light that dazzled your eyes; your stomach began to twist painfully as you winced and curled into a near fetal position. Although you didn’t know it yet, your day just became a lot more complicated….
BABOOOOOOOM!
Your eyes shot up as the explosion and tremor almost threw you off of the chair. You saw…strangely…only a wall of shimmering white in front of you. Slowly, your gaze began to rise and your stomach began to fall. Towering over you, TK smirked down as her voice thundered, “HUH…WEIRD, WHERE DID THAT GIRL RUN OFF TO?” (https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BtubKhWCMAEP...) The wall of white that had suddenly appeared before you as the situation came sharply into focus for you. That wall? TK’s foot. You? Less than an inch tall. A dark shadow enveloped you and sprinkled dust down on you and your table as the stormtrooper’s boot began to rise over you. You almost fell out of your chair as you began trying to scramble out from the false sky hanging overhead…if you didn’t get out of the way then y-
BABOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!
TK smirked as she began to slowly grind her foot into the floor, feeling the crunch of your booth beneath her boot (https://pbs.twimg.com/media/B-UVzquCIAEv...). Served that bitch right, TK thought, giving her white boot a sharp twist so she could enjoy a few more crisp crunches. She never looked down at the carnage when she finished with these jobs…afterall, who took the time to examine every bug they smashed? No. Instead, at the end of the day, TK would enjoy seeing the mashed remains of your body dirtying her tread along with the rest of the crap she’d pick up walking through the con…or that was what she thought. Although the young woman was right that your booth had been reduced to splinters under the toe of her boot…you had avoided becoming paste by a fraction of a hair. You didn’t have long to think; staying here was just asking to get crushed! If TK was the one who shrank you, then TK was maybe the only person who’d know how to turn you back to normal. Jumping for the rubber edge of her stormtrooper boot, you just barely managed to latch onto TK before the giantess spun around on the toe of her white, high-heeled boot, and began walking to her own table to join back up with Vamp.
BABOOOM~….BABOOOOOOOM~……BABOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM~……
Fortunately for you, the walking monolith you’d pissed off had really believed that you were nothing more than a greasy red smear under the toe of her boot. Instead, you were clinging to the rubber rim of her flawless white stormtrooper boot’s sole…like the bug she’d reduced you to.
“LEEANNA!” TK shouted, waving her friend down who’d just finished taking a selfie with another fan.
The Apu cosplayer said a quick thanks to the young woman who bounced away happily before turning to her friend with a smirk. “You weren’t too hard on them, were you? Seriously, I’m ok,” LeeAnna said. The pair of them had been very close…LeeAnna knew that TK always did something to people that pissed her off. She didn’t know what, but whatever it was, there had never been a repeat offender.
TK roll her eyes, “They got what they deserved, don’t worry about it~”
As the pair joked overhead, you were more focused on the situation below their notice. It was nothing short of a miracle that you’d managed to keep your grip on TK’s boot as she strolled across the con. The woman had almost bumped into people so many times that you’d watched flashbacks of your life at least seven times by now. The booming voices overhead helped you realize one thing though…Vamp didn’t know what TK was doing and seemed more than forgiving of your little slip-up earlier. If that really was true, then getting her attention might be your only chance to get big again! You swallowed nervously and stole a glance at your destination, Vamp’s flexing, bare, and VERY large toes (https://pics.wikifeet.com/LeeAnna-Vamp-F...). Taking a deep breath, you relaxed your death-grip on the edge of TK’s boot and plummeted to the tile floor below….
THUMP!
It was a less forgiving fall than you’d expected; had you landed a little more awkwardly, you wouldn’t have been surprised if you broke an ankle. Instead, you just sprained it going by the small jolt of pain running up your leg. You could still put weight on it, but you’d be slower…not the best thing to be in a world where you could be crushed underfoot. Shaking the negative images from your mind, you began running toward the tan wall of flesh in front of you. It felt like things were starting to look up for you! High above though, TK had just started to look down…
“Stacey? Everything ok?” LeeAnna asked, seeing her friend glare at something on the ground. “Stacey?”
Without uttering a word, TK grunted and slowly lifted her right foot, aiming it at the tiny speck trying to scuttle across the tile floor (https://i.pinimg.com/736x/fc/e0/4f/fce04...)….
BABOOOOM!
You fell flat on your ass as the white monolithic boot you’d just jumped from suddenly shifted and slammed down in front of you! With your face just mere inches away from the rubber wall, you realized that if you’d been a bit faster, then you’d have been crushed under the heel of TK’s massive boot. The impact made your whole-body shudder down to the bone and knocked you flat on your ass! You struggled to move as the tremors continued all around you. Flipping onto your stomach, you tried your best to crawl away just as the monolithic wall of white rubber began to grind back and froth as TK once again thought she’d caught you underfoot.
Suddenly aware of Vamp’s gaze on her, TK smiled awkwardly and tried to cover her ass as she said, “It was a bug…big-ass bug going right for you. Didn’t want it nipping you or something, sorry! You know those things gross me out…”
“Since when?” Vamp giggled…it wasn’t like TK had ever been especially squeamish.
“Since the little shits were in my costume one time,” she replied, slowly lifting her heel to see the bloody mess she hoped decorated her boot. Nothing again! Her eyes narrowed and scanned the ground until they finally fell on the small, ant-sized creature just a few inches from where she stomped down. Biting her bottom lip, TK tried to cover for herself as she sighed, “Gross…that’s gonna stain the treads.” Slowly, the began moving her right hand toward her boot…and toward your tiny body that once again fell down in the presence of her massive, grasping fingers….
“N-No! Nononono!” you screamed as you began running with all your might back in the direction of TK’s boot. Each step you took sent another wave of pain up your leg, but you couldn’t afford to stop. The ground shook as TK’s armored finger smashed into the ground and began to drag along the tiles. There was an ear-shattering CRACK as the plastic-covered fingers hit the edges of each tile and clipped the stone…the grating sound of their approach growing stronger with each passing second. Your ears were pounding with your heartbeat! Each footfall felt like your shoes were filled with lead. Your body was drenched in a cold sweat. Your brain had thrown all complex thoughts out of the window and only screamed at you to keep running….
BAM!
TK grinned as she quickly swiped her fingers along the ground and felt the dull smack of something tiny against her middle finger. The tiny form of your body rolled in front of her, landing just out of the reach of her boot’s massive, white heel.

112122232.content:
TK’s brown eyes scanned the ground, looking at the bits of dirt and garbage from fans and cosplayers walking over all day. “Where’d you go little bug? Don’t worry…it won’t hurt for long,” she whispered, knowing that her tiny target would be able to hear her. Squatting, she looked down between her feet and couldn’t help but crack a smile as she finally saw you. “Heh, I didn’t know the gun would work that well, you’re fucking pathetic down there~” she teased, slowly standing back to her full height as she sneered down at the insect between her boots. She thought of just stepping on you and ending your life beneath her boot, but that would be too easy. After all the trouble you’d given her by not just getting crushed right at the start, TK wanted to make this special. Tapping her foot, the giantess smirked as your tiny form fell down and wriggled like the bug you were…

You struggled to get up, exhausted after getting flicked by her fingers, nearly smashed underfoot, and the sheer stress of finding yourself Lego-sized on the floor in one of the most highly trafficked areas of this convention. For a moment, you thought that begging in front of her might make TK relent. Maybe if you let her just humiliate you, she’d let you live. This was all just part of her act anyway…right?

“HMMMMMMM~ NO, I THINK YOU’RE STILL TOO BIG,” TK’s voice thundered overhead, threatening to burst your eardrums.

You could feel your heart leap into your throat as the giantess’ words registered in your ears. There was no way you heard her right…right? Looking up, you waited for the punch-line to TK’s cruel joke, but all that you could see was the unamused face of the brunette beauty as she slowly began to point her gun at you once more (https://www.instazu.com/media/1871124755...). Terrified, you flipped onto your stomach and tried to take off running to avoid getting caught in that horrific light once again. You maybe took one step though before the dirty ground around you was subjected to the searchlight-like blast from the tip of TK’s gun. “Nononononononono!” you screamed, feeling sick at TK’s already massive frame started doubling in size as you were reduced from a Lego-man to an ant….

“STACEY!” a familiar voice boomed, sounding even louder as the ground started shaking even more violently. Looking in the direction of the quakes, you felt your blood turn to ice as an absolutely colossal LeeAnna walked toward her friend, now dressed in her matching stormtrooper armor (https://www.reddit.com/r/cosplaygirls/co...). You were struggling to make sense of how something as big as LeeAnna could move at such a blinding speed! Each step she took seemed to cross more than a football field in length before a massive white boot slammed down with the force of a collapsing building. In a matter of seconds, LeeAnna seemed to have crossed several miles of distance as yet another wall of white boot slammed down just in front of your body. “WHAT DO YOU THINK? I MADE SOME CHANGES AND UPPED THE POLISH A LITTLE~ IT WAS LOOKING DULL IN THE LAST SET OF PHOTOS,” she chirped overhead, happily twisting a bit as the white rubber treads of her stormtrooper boot inches closer and closer like a stalking predator…

TK took a moment to look LeeAnna over, making sure to step a little closer so her tiny toy was effectively trapped in a small triangle made up of their white boots. “It definitely looks cleaner…but isn’t it going to get dirty walking through here? Like what about the boots?” TK asked, noticing a small smirk on LeeAnna’s face.

“Come ON, Stacey, do you seriously think I overlooked that? Watch” she said, slowly dragging her foot forward so the rubber front scraped along the less-than-clean floor…

GRNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN….

“Y-You’ve got to be fucking kidding me!” you screamed at the sky as the LeeAnna glacier continued its unrelenting charge at you. The rubber wall overran everything in its way: dust, dirt, pebbles, and grime. The growing roar in your ears was a horrific reminder that the rubber wall was gaining, ready to plow you over like it had trampled everything else! Putting on one more burst of speed, you sprinted with all your might as the shadow of LeeAnna’s tilting boot finally overtook you. Just as you were about to be steamrolled, LeeAnna lifted her foot up, the tip springing forward and slamming into your back. If the wall had been made of anything slightly harder than rubber, then you would have doubtlessly been scattered across the front in a red splotch…instead, LeeAnna unknowingly kicked you at her friend.

TK just barely noticed something bounce off the toe of her boot and couldn’t help but smirk as she realized you were officially too small to feel! She looked up at LeeAnna to see her friend’s proud grin, declaring triumphantly, “See? No mess, no dirt!” The tip of her startrooper boot really was immaculate, but TK was more interested in finding your tiny ass for the moment. “Stacey?” LeeAnna asked, frowning since her friend clearly wasn’t as excited about her new achievement as she was.

“Sorry, there’s a weird shadow,” TK said quickly, stepping around so she was right next to LeeAnna. If she didn’t know you were down there, then she would have absolutely lost track of your form…but there you were, less than a half-inch tall and struggling to stand as TK shifted position (https://live.staticflickr.com/2904/14578...). The cosplayer couldn’t help but giggle as she realized that she had definitely stepped on bigger ants in her kitchen…. Looking at LeeAnna, TK flashed a smile and teased, “Ok, ok, ok…you’re going to have to show me how you did that~ There was someone here earlier who stepped on something and it RUINED her boot. I’ve been paranoid about what I’m stepping on for the last couple of minutes.”

“At least you have shoes!” another voice shot back, grabbing LeeAnna’s and TK’s attention.

“Vampy!” LeeAnna said, holding out her arms as a mass of black, white, and red spandex charged forward and embraced the stormtrooper. The two collided and broke into a fit of laughter as Vamp and Vampy attempted to untangle themselves. Stepping back, LeeAnna couldn’t help but show the look of amazement on her face as she exclaimed, “Holy shit! The Silk outfit looks perfect! I didn’t think it was going to be ready!”

Vampy couldn’t help but giggle, saying, “I didn’t think it would either, but it all came together in the end” As Vampy took another step back, TK could barely contain her excitement…. It seemed almost poetic really, the bug was going to be done in by a spider!

You thought that you were doomed when you bounced off of TK’s boot. Then, you thought your heart was going to stop when Vampy had charged the pair and jumped at LeeAnna. Both times you’d gotten lucky…but this time it seemed that you weren’t going to make it as the sky overhead became the dusty sole of Vampy’s spandex or latex-clad foot! “Hey! Wait, I’m down here! P-Please! Shit, shit, shit!” you screamed, turning to run as the sound of the approaching ped roared in your ear like a plane was crashing out of the sky. You stole one glance back and immediately regretted it; there wasn’t anything in front of your eyes besides the outline of five toes pressed against the skin-tight fabric. “N-”

THUMP!....

You couldn’t move an inch as the spandex pressed down on your body. Somehow, you had avoided an immediate death for a third time…or at least postponed it. While you were currently between Vampy’s second and big toes, all the giantess would have to do was twist her foot or scrunch her digits to turn you into a grimy splotch on the foot of her outfit. Through the material, you could hear your unwitting goddess brag, “IT EVEN LETS ME MOVE REALLY EASILY! I THOUGHT IT WOULD MAKE THE PATTERNS LOOK STUPID, BUT SEE? EVEN IF I BEND A LITTLE…” You could hear the sound of millions of synthetic threads screaming as Vampy shifted to strike a pose. For a moment her toes lifted up, but only long enough for you to see the shit-eating grin on TK’s face before Vampy’s digits slammed down, pressing you into the ground with a crushing amount of force (https://www.instagram.com/p/BqtahZ8Ag8n/...)….
112122232.title: Shrinking Annoyance and Growing Panic

choices: Stay with the devil you know and run back to Vampy's toes...
You might not be able to climb LeeAnna's boots, but what about the gun?
1121222322.content:
For a moment, it seemed like this would be the end for you as Vampy’s toes slowly drew closer together, crushing you beneath them. The spandex costume slowly pressed down, holding you down as the massive digits settled on either side of your body. High overhead, Vampy didn’t know about the tiny person she had trapped under her toes…LeeAnna was clueless that encouraging her friend to pose was leading to your untimely end…and TK was struggling not to bust a gut as she wondered how long it would take for Vampy’s toes to crush you into a gory paste. Posing like Silk, Vampy’s toes slowly came closer together and pointed while her leg moved out, dragging you along the ground as you were brought along for the ride (https://www.instagram.com/p/BqtahZ8Ag8n/...). Her big toe pressed down to help the woman keep her balance, unaware that her digit was pressing the air from your lungs like the contents of a toothpaste tube. Struggling like mad against the impossible mass of Vampy’s toe, darkness slowly began to creep in…this was it…dead under a woman’s toes without her ever knowing…a bug’s death, just like TK said….

THOOM…THOOM…THOOM…

For a split-second, Vampy’s toes lifted enough for you to suck in a new breath and catch a glimpse of the world beyond the giant woman’s spandex-clad toes. All you could see though was another giant woman’s white stormtrooper boots drawing closer and covering dozens of yards with each careful, “small” step. You couldn’t tell which of the two Star Wars women were walking toward you, but you prayed that either one could get Vampy’s toes off of you before a twitch burst you like a balloon!

THOOOOOOOM!...

The giantess stopped, leaving a football field’s worth of distance between her boot and Vampy’s toes…so less than a single step of distance. So close, but so far! You attempted to claw your way out, but the pressure on your back was still too intense! Frustrated, you began growing more frustrated by the second, swinging your fists pathetically against the spandex ceiling crushing you with no effect. Or, at least, that was what you thought. Slamming your fist into the fleshy pad of her digit…it suddenly lifted! Your body acted on its own, scuttling forward across the grimy ground in a last-ditch effort to escape from your fate as a smudge under Vampy’s toe. “PERFECT!” LeeAnna’s voice boomed as a new shadow engulfed your body. Looking up, you saw that TK wasn’t the owner of the white boot before you…but that didn’t mean you were safe.

THUNK!

You’d managed to avoid pissing yourself, but now that the butt of LeeAnna’s gun had come within a fraction of an inch of crushing you, there was no way to control yourself (https://i.pinimg.com/originals/84/7a/92/...). Looking up, you saw that TK’s friend wasn’t looking anywhere near you. Somehow, that made it all the more terrifying. Trapped between Vampy’s foot and LeeAnna’s gunstock, you turned and began sprinting back toward the newly-arrived giantess. At least if you made it to Vampy, you could try climbing her outfit…you already knew there was no way for a bug like you to scale the white wall of the stormtrooper boots…. You slowed down before reaching the digits, keenly aware that one wrong move and you'd almost certainly be crushed this time. Vampy or Vamp? Which was the right choice?!...
1121222322.title: Rough Silk, Run-down Shrink...

choices: your tiny form, writhing on the floor as LeeAnna took a step in your direction
Vamp looking down and reaching for you
11212223223.content:
Vampy was an unknown quantity and Vamp had actually seemed like a saint compared to her friend who’d reduced you from a human to a hum-ant! The towering white walls of her stormtrooper boots loomed in the distance like a sanctuary in the middle of the dessert. You knew this was possibly your last chance at getting saved; if the girls decided to walk anywhere else, then the ground around you would go back to no-man’s land in the middle of the convention…dooming you to die under some weeb’s shoe before the day was out. With an existential clock ticking in the back of your mind, a final flood of adrenaline surged through your v-

THOOOOOOOOOOM!

“F-Fuck!” you screamed at the top of your lungs as a very different wall of white rubber slammed down in front of you. Your head snapped up to reveal TK was the foot’s owner…if you’d actually been a little faster, then there was no doubt that she would have successfully splattered you across the floor. It looked like she was posing next to LeeAnna for Vampy’s benefit; at the very least, it was a blessing that she hadn’t noticed you down at her feet (https://live.staticflickr.com/2904/14578...). Unfortunately, the near-miss had knocked you on your ass and had you so shaken that you weren’t able to get back off the floor. Whimpering, you started trying to crawl around the tip of TK’s boot, praying that you could make it to LeeAnna before anything else went wrong. You could feel the odds of your survival dropping with each passing second as the three goddesses stood as unknowing executioners all around you….

Dragging yourself around the tip of TK’s boot, you could feel the exhaustion creeping in after so many close calls. Every move you made hurt, your muscles were screaming, your bones ached, your head felt like it was on fire. The mere shifting of TK’s boot sent small tremors through the ground. You could hear the horrendous grating sound of the giant boots grinding against tile as the two stormtroopers shifted positions for each pose they struck. “Just keep going…a-almost there,” you whispered, trying to push yourself forward. As long as you could escape TK, you figured there would be a chance at escaping a bug’s fate. Looking up, you thanked God that the giantess hadn’t noticed…you? Your heart stopped for a moment as your gaze met the deep brown eyes of your tormenter for a fraction of a second. With a wink, TK’s gaze shifted from your tiny body back to her friends. You thought for a moment that it might have been a mistake, but as TK’s boot slowly lifted and blotted out the sky with the dirty underside of her boot, you knew the giantess planned to finish you off. “N-No! TK! Please! S-Someone! Anyone! Save m-”

THUD….

The thick rubber tread pressed down your back and legs with a terrifying amount of force as the giantess settled her weight and finally had you right where she wanted you…pinned under her boots like the little bug you were (https://www.instagram.com/p/BBYXVBIIFDj/...). For a moment, you thought that you might have survived the worst of it. If she was just going to step on you like this, then you’d survive. You’d be bruised, but you’d survive. That hope quickly vanished, however, when you felt a tugging on your back…a horrified scream left your lips as TK slowly began to shift her foot, grinding you between the cold tile and rough rubber. This time she was serious. If you couldn’t get free from the tread, then TK was going to snuff you out like a cigarette butt….

“Ugh, I’m starving,” Vamp whined, leaning a little more heavily against TK as the stormtrooper continued to grind the ball of her right foot into the tile. This time the bug would be dead, she thought. “Heeeey!” Vamp said, waving her hand in front of TK’s face, pouting, “Hello? Anyone in there? I said I’m starving over here; are we going to take a lunch break?”

Giving her foot a final, rough twist, TK smirked, “Fine…but don’t overdo it or else you might not fit in the outfit!”

“Ass” LeeAnna said with a giggle as she hip-bumped TK and knocked her friend over a few steps. Stealing a glance at the ground, TK could see….
